Welcome to my personal website.

I am an assistant professor in Epidemiology and Health Economics at the Faculties of Medicine and Science of the University of Zürich.

I work at the intersections of medicine, economics, health, and regulation.

Here you will find updated information about my work as researcher and teacher.
